name: Silvanus Leafwhisper
short_description: an elven general merchant and armorer
long_description: The shop keeper is an lithe elf wearing a bright green tunic and trousers, He has whispy blonde hair and no facial hair. He smiles broadly at you as you look him over.

dialogue.greeting: Greetings, traveler. How may I serve you?
dialogue.default: I offer a wide variety of goods - equipment, weapons, and armor crafted by elven hands.
dialogue.goodbye: Walk in harmony with nature, friend.
